content: Yeah, we had a great time in Denver! We visited my sister's family and spent some time exploring the city and the surrounding areas. One of the highlights was a hike we took in Rocky Mountain National Park, which was about an hour and a half drive from their house. The views from the top were just amazing. We also visited the Denver Zoo, which was a lot of fun for the kids. And, of course, we had to try some of the local craft beer and food scene, which did not disappoint!
